bossDialog: I'M GONNA STAB YA! I'M GONNA STAB YA! I'M GONNA STAB YA!
Ooh, fresh meat, and I just got done sharpening my best knives! It's my lucky day!
You don't look like much. Whatever, I'll just chop you up and feed you to the hounds. Hold still!

cardBonuses.2: Your creatures deal 10% more damage to {CLASS_Chaos} creatures.
cardBonuses.5: Your creatures deal 10% more damage to {CLASS_Chaos} creatures.
cardBonuses.8: Your creatures deal 10% more damage to {CLASS_Chaos} creatures.

master.dialog: Carvers are all about the stab-stab-stab. They don't care much about who they hurt, either - even their own friends are prone to lose some blood every now and again. Anyway, let's have ourselves a duel, shall we?
master.name: Dice

name: Carver
